constraints.name: path_category_uniformity
constraints.description: 对于每个商业提案，其所在的车站必须是赞助车站或位于两个赞助车站之间的路径上
constraints.formal: ∀ business proposal X, ∃ sponsored stations S1, S2 such that X is on the path between S1 and S2 or X is a sponsored station

constraints.name: continuous_path_constraint
constraints.description: 选择的提案范围必须形成一个有效的提案集，即所有商业提案都满足上述路径约束
constraints.formal: For proposals i to j, all business proposals in this range must satisfy the path_through_sponsored_stations constraint

result.description: 求满足条件的最长子数组长度

result.name: optimal_substructure
result.description: 最优子结构：问题的解可以通过子问题的最优解组合而成，每个子问题的解是独立且最优的
